detail_desc: Long-sleeved jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit – a modern fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Off-the-shoulder dress in a viscose weave with broderie anglaise. Narrow shoulder straps, a wide flounce at the top and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.

Set with a bodysuit, trousers and hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with sewn-on ears.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Dungarees in washed, stretch cotton denim with worn details. Relaxed fit with adjustable straps that meet at the back, press-studs at the sides and a fake fly. Three-part chest pocket, side and back pockets and tapered legs. The dungarees are made partly from recycled cotton.
5-pocket jeans in denim with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in mesh with embroidery. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti straps and a concealed zip at the back. Jersey lining dress.
Long dress in jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck, short cap sleeves, a seam with draping at the waist and a high slit at the back. Unlined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and ribbed hems.
Crop tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in heavily draping jersey made from a modal blend with a sheen. V-neck with lacing at the top and a slit at the front.
Long, V-neck dress in lace with short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist, concealed zip at the back and skirt with a gentle flare to the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Maxi dress in soft silk with a V-neck front and back and long, wide, tie-top shoulder straps. Straight style with a low-cut, gathered, voluminous skirt.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, narrow sides, high-cut legs and a high cut at the back.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Elasticated waist and decorative buttons down the front.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a ballerina neckline and short sleeves. Unlined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with mesh at the back, mesh shoulder straps and a racer back.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved shirt in a printed viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in marled cotton jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, a seam at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and a straight hem.
3/4-length leggings in sturdy, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.
Short top in jacquard-patterned jersey in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.

Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a front pocket, press-studs at the sides and a fake fly. Front and back pockets, and raw edge hems with lace sections.
Linen scarf with raw edges and short fringe trims on the short sides.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a covered button.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with ribbed straps that fasten at the back. Contrasting-colour striped frill trim at the top that continues over to the back, and ribbed hems.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Fitted running top in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated hood and a zip at the top. Long raglan sleeves, a small zipped pocket at the back, reflective details and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in washed stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the top.

Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and large, pointed lace collar. Opening with a concealed zip at the back and button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Knee-length shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Short, cold shoulder top in airy jersey crêpe with a frill-trimmed V-neck, wrapover front, long sleeves and elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit shaftless socks with a silicone trim around the heel to hold them in place.

Top in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Double-layered at the front with gathered side seams for a draped effect. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, smocking at the back, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the hem and a flared peplum.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped front pockets, a hook and loop tab at the cuffs and reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Dress with a round neckline and gathered seam at the top. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
Elasticated scrunchies in a pleated weave.
Long 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist and slightly lower crotch.
Tights with an elasticated waist. 20 denier.
Waist-high briefs in jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Knee-high boots in imitation suede with round toes, a partially elasticated shaft and zip in one side. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Gently fitted jacket in a textured weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, welt front pockets and sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Short, sleeveless lace dress with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Oversized shirt in washed denim with pearly press-studs down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke front and back, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and a rounded hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Round-necked, long-sleeved top in stretch, cotton-blend jersey. Slim fit.
Flared skirt in a lightweight, patterned cotton weave. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim at the top. Unlined.

Long, straight-cut shirt jacket in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets and concealed pockets in the side seams. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Short-sleeved Henley tops in soft slub cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline and a button placket.
Straight-cut biker jacket in soft imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative press-studs, zipped front pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No buttons. Lined.

Fully lined bikini. Triangle top with a decorative bow at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that fasten at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bottoms with bows at the sides.

Fitted blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication over the shoulders and a sweetheart neckline with gathers at the bust. Smocking at the back and long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Straight-style jumper in a rib-knit wool and mohair blend with a small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Tie in patterned silk. Width 7 cm.
Leather sandals with crossover straps and a decorative bow on the front, and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Leather and rubber insoles and rubber soles.
Calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with a square neckline and long puff sleeves. Gathers at one side to create a draped effect, and a wrapover skirt with a slit at the front. Lined front.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Suit trousers in a slub-weave cotton blend with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Clamdiggers in washed cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the front and long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Short wrap dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with a V-neck, short cap sleeves, seam and ties at the waist, and an asymmetric skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
